casebody.data:
Arthur CHAPMAN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Officer D. MACK, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158169
COA: 335678 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 3, 2019.
